original: Ekdahl, Johan Birger, direktör, Jönköping, f. 16/6/96 av sysisilom. J. L. E. o. Matilda Jansson. G. 21 m. Märta Sjöstam. Barn: Birgit f. 22, g, m. dr Rolf Heijbel, Kar^lskrona, Marianne 24, g. m. 1’öjtn. Tore Hennig, Karlskrona, Göran 31. — Stud :ex.’samt stud. v. hand:inst. Res. t. Norge, Danm., Island, Engl., Frankr., Belg., Holl., Tyskl., Lettl., Estl. o. Finl. Korresp. v. A-B Gasaccumulator 17, v. Bure A-B i Bureå 18, sekr. o. kont:chef v. A-B Fören. Sv. Tändsticksfabr. 19-28, därefter verkst. dir. o. styr :led. i Jön-köp. Motorfabr. Led. av fattigv :styr., polisndn samt nykterh :ndn 28-32. RIFO.
translated: Ekdahl, Johan Birger, director, Jönköping, born on June 16, 1896, to parents J.L.E and Matilda Jansson. Married on 1921 to Märta Sjöstam. Children: Birgit, born in 1922, married to Dr. Rolf Heijbel, Karlskrona, Marianne born in 1924, married to Lieutenant Tore Hennig, Karlskrona, and Göran born in 1931. Completed his high school studies and studied at a business institute. Traveled to Norway, Denmark, Iceland, England, France, Belgium, Holland, Germany, Latvia, Estonia, and Finland. Corresponded for AB Gasaccumulator in 1917 and for Bure AB in Bureå in 1918. Secretary and head of accounting at AB Fören. Sv. Tändsticksfabr. from 1919-1928, after which he became Managing Director and board member of Jönköping Motorfabr. Member of the board of the poor relief, police, and temperance association from 1928-1932. RIFO.
